articles.title: U.S. appeals court finds Trump's global tariffs illegal, but leaves them in place now
articles.description: A U.S. federal appeals court on Friday ruled that most of President Donald Trump's tariffs on a wide range of trading partners were illegal. However, the court has allowed them to remain in place for now, giving the administration time to appeal the decision to the Supreme Court. [3]

articles.title: US revokes visas of Palestinian president and other officials ahead of UN General Assembly
articles.description: The U.S. Secretary of State has revoked the visas of Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas and 80 other officials. This action comes just before the upcoming high-level meeting of the U.N. General Assembly. [7, 8]

articles.title: Trump blocks $4.9B in foreign aid Congress OK'd, using maneuver last seen nearly 50 years ago
articles.description: President Donald Trump has informed House Speaker Mike Johnson that he will not be spending $4.9 billion in foreign aid that was approved by Congress. Trump is utilizing a rare executive power known as a pocket rescission, a move that hasn't been used in nearly half a century. [1, 2]
